newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin up five cents to 14.17 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin up five cents to 14.17 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price rose five cents to 14.17 ringgit ($5.66) a kg, after tracking a higher overnight close on the London Metal Exchange (LME), traders said.
"There was some good buying and the market went up, mainly because of the LME," said a trader.

Initial bids outweighed offers by 164 tonnes to 87. Final turnover was 132 tonnes compared to 123 on Thursday. Buyers were from Japan, Europe and Malaysia. The local premium over London was retained at $55.
